name: Vegan Mediterranean Salad
author: Connie Fabian Byrnes
summary: Recently, we hosted an International Potluck Dinner Party at our home. Our theme was Greek food, so of course, we listened to Trio Bel Canto (the only Greek music allowed). Here's a recipe from our party!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4  radishes, chopped, or more to taste
3  green onions, sliced, or more to taste
directions: Whisk olive oil, lemon, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper in a large bowl
Add red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cucumbers, tomatoes, radishes, dill pickles, and green onions; toss to combine
Let marinate in the refrigerator until flavors combine, 10 to 15 minutes
